Passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world challenges.

projects.name: Smart Parking System with Number Plate Recognition (SIH2023)
projects.description: Developed a smart parking system using computer vision to scan and display vehicle number plates. Created the front-end to improve user interaction, enhancing parking efficiency by guiding vehicles to available spots.
